title: The Sleeve
credit_line: Gift through the Museum Donor Program of the American Federation of the Arts
provenance_text:
Robert Natkin [1930-2010], New York, NY; Poindexter Gallery, New York, NY [1]; American Federation of the Arts, New York, NY [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 283) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Poindexter Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased with a gift from an anonymous donor, through the Museum Donor Program of the American Federation of the Arts.
